Feline2::
She looked at HotRod and then to Squizzy and FZ. "Am I allowed to go?"

Squizzy:
"So far as I know, your free to do what you want.

Feline2::
She turned and followed HotRod.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> The question was hard to answer. They needed to talk in private. 
> "We need to talk, alone. Come with me." He motioned for her to 
follow.
